attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what is actually going on with our country but as soon as I tried to open it my phone glitches and I could use my phone for 2 days! Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Do NOT download

attributes.review: this is quite honestly the worst app i’ve ever used! it glitches constantly, has terribly inaccurate information, and supports racism, sexism, and homophobia! overall, i do NOT recommend. if i could give it negative stars i would
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: This app is horrible, I don’t know why people make a big deal out of it. It loads so slow and every time I try to get in, it just goes out of the app. Moreover, there are so many bugs. I do not recommend this app at all
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: this is the most awful app i have ever used. it keeps crashing whenever i open it, it keeps telling me to send money for some charity that doesn’t exist, and it’s overall the worst app anyone could ever use. DON’T USE IT.
attributes.title: i hate this app

attributes.review: This app is so bad. It literally made my phone explode and set fire to my entire house. I could have died! If I could give it less than one star I would. Be warned, if you don’t want your phone to EXPLODE then stay far, far away from this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I think this app really isn’t laid out well and it is confusing. Extremely glitchy! Whoever developed it needs to rethink their skills and opinions... Biased and I think not very true accurate information on this app for us.
attributes.title: Not functional

attributes.review: the only thing the american society has left in quarantine is tiktok. the gen z’s will not let trump have the power to take our favorite app down. we will not loose and we will fight for what’s right. so instead of trump deleting tiktok we are deleting his app called trump 2020. fight to keep tiktok by giving this app a 1 star review and then commenting about how you don’t want it to be deleted and comment how bad the trump 2020 app is. gen z’s lets make america great again by canceling trump.
attributes.title: please delete this app

attributes.review: This app is probably one of the worst apps I’ve ever used. It constantly crashes and takes up way too much storage. My phone has crashed abt 18 times using this app and I’ve only had it for the past 2 hours. Absolute bs
attributes.title: Worst. App. Ever.

attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE 😍🥰😘 once i opened the app i literally gagged. it will never convince anyone to vote for this racist pedo named Donald Trump🤪🥰🥳🤩. this is a danger to society so PLEASE DO EVERYONE A FAVOR AND TAKE THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE. why would anyone ever download this app? it made me puke. literally. you have 1 week to remove this app off the app store 😍😘👁👅👁⚡️✨
attributes.title: ✨✨✨this app is terrible ✨✨✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and got a Russian virus. I took my phone to sprint and later found out the app was using my camera without me permission. My privacy was invaded and i can longer trust this app nor the government. This app must be removed from the App Store.
attributes.title: Trump has a 2in punisher
